content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the frequencies?

choices.label: <math alttext="f sub 2 is greater than f sub 3, which is greater than f sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="f sub 1 is greater than f sub 3, which is greater than f sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="f sub 3 is greater than f sub 2, which is greater than f sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="f sub 1 is greater than f sub 2, which is greater than f sub 3" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="f sub 1 is greater than f sub 3, which is greater than f sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
